doc.title: Roti Ki Keemat
doc.plot: This is the story of Shankur, a kind generous man who's path in life is to help those who are less fortunate and need food. His own mother died after giving blood to get food for them and Shankur made it his life plan to help those in the same situation he was in with his mother. Befriending an orphan girl, Shanker and Bijlee set up a place where children can go for food and shelter, until one day their happiness is shattered by the evil Jagavar Chaudhry. Will Shankur ever fulfill his dreams of ridding his town of child hunger?
